mapper.select: select tranETime from (select to_char(TRAN_ETIME,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') tranETime from t_car c,t_transact t where c.car_id=t.car_id and t.tran_state=2 and c.car_id=#{0} order by t.TRAN_ETIME desc) where rownum<=1
mapper.update: update T_TRANSACT set TRAN_STATE=3 where CAR_ID=#{0}
update T_TRANSACT set TRAN_ETIME=to_date(#{tranEtime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') where CAR_ID=#{carId} and TRAN_STATE=1
